faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Clear your doubts about our services and how we can help your business.

q1.question: Is it real AI?
q1.answer: Yes, we use advanced AI technologies such as GPT-4, Claude and proprietary models. It's not just marketing, they are real applications of artificial intelligence that generate tangible results for your business.

q2.question: Do I need to know programming?
q2.answer: Absolutely not. Our solutions are developed to be intuitive and easy to use, regardless of your technical knowledge. Our team takes care of all the technical part for you.

q3.question: How much does it cost?
q3.answer: The values vary according to the complexity and scope of the project. We offer personalized plans that adapt to your company's needs and budget. Contact us to receive a detailed proposal.

q4.question: What is the delivery time?
q4.answer: The deadline depends on the complexity of the project, but our agile process allows incremental deliveries from the first weeks. Simple projects can be delivered in 2-4 weeks, while more complex projects can take 2-3 months.

q5.question: Can I automate tools I already use?
q5.answer: Yes! One of our specialties is integrating and automating existing tools. We can connect your current tools (such as CRM, ERP, spreadsheets) and automate workflows between them.
